description:
Welcome to my first HD movie! And meet one incredibly super smokin omigosh he's hot dude to showcase the quality! Rocco!
Piercing blue eyes, an amazing physique, and a dick that will drill a giant hole in ya no matter which hole you choose...another porn cock!
Rocco is one nice guy too. Confident but not cocky, and eager to please. He grew up playing sports and has thrown himself in to modeling full time. Thank goodness he is not shy about showing off his dick!
I know I say this too much, but he's a great guy, and enjoyed the day I got to spend with him.
He's straight, but said he might be willing to get a blow job. So I am keeping my fingers crossed that he will be back for more.
Now I just gotta find someone to handle that thang!
Ok, about the video quality. This is my first attempt at releasing an HD film. The size will larger (screen size as well as file size) so be prepared for longer downloads, but much better quality.
I'm gonna do the conversion to HD slowly. I'm still not pleased with the audio quality (and we had a construction crew AND heavy rain during this shoot). But I wanted to get a few vids out there, and then maybe ramp up to it more often.
Hope you enjoy this guy, I think he is one amazing dude!
title: Rocco - Solo
